name: Blagmoz
description:
Dash, cast, and buff your way to the top of Blagmoz Tower in this lightning-fast PVP precision platformer. Power up by drinking potions, getting kills, and sacrificing your friends at the Altar. Become the ultimate glass cannon in this one-hit-kill battle of sorceries!

Build streak and power up!

Increase your streak by getting kills and sacrificing other wizards' bodies at the Altar to gain extra mobility and spell slots! Sacrificing wizards with lots of Streak lets you steal most of it back from them.

Battle on the couch or online!

Play locally or host an online match for your friends. But who needs friends anyway, because Blagmoz has a public server browser, too!

Key Features

  • 2-4 player online or local multiplayer + a public lobby browser
  • 60+ levels across 3 areas
  • 16+ potions that buff you up, hinder your opponents, and turn people into frogs
  • Mysterious rising sea of goo
  • Wall jumping, wave dashing, and head stomping action
  • Unlockable areas, potions, and costumes
